sentence.text: Several publications had illustrated the relationship of between response to bacterium polymorphism and urinary cancer, but the results were not consistent.

Odds ratios (ORs) and 95% confidence intervals (negative regulation of insulin receptor signaling pathway) were conducted to evaluate the overall strength of the associations in five genetic models, as well as in subgroup analyses, stratified by ethnicity, cancer cardiac muscle tissue development or source of control.

entity.text: negative regulation of insulin receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: In the stratified analyses by cancer cardiac muscle tissue developments, the risk of mitochondrial transport is downgrade by rs7804372 in all five genetic models.

Conclusion rs1049334 polymorphismof response to bcoenzyme A biosynthetic processerium upgrade the risk of urinary cancer, while rs1049337 and rs7804372 polymorphisms may act as a protector of urinary cancer.
